list_definition.definition: to start a law case against

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She’s threatening to sue the company for negligence.

list_definition.mean_english: chính thức yêu cầu cái gì trước tòa

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: especially in law) to ask for (eg divorce).
